title: 服务端崩溃啊，大佬过来看看
author: oqingzhao
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Sakura_End 于 2019-2-18 11:17 编辑 

[09:44:30 警告]: Forge Mod Loader detected missing blocks/items.

There are 1 missing blocks and items in this save.
If you continue the missing blocks/items will get removed.
A world backup will be automatically created in your saves directory.

Missing Blocks/Items:
EnderIO:bucketXpjuice


Run the command /fml confirm or or /fml ca
ncel to proceed.
Alternatively start the server with -Dfml.queryResult=confirm or -Dfml.queryResult=cancel to preselect the answer.
[09:44:32 ERROR]: An error occured while connecting to URL 'https://dl.dropbox.com/u/90411166/Mod%20Versions/Mekanism.txt.'
[09:44:53 ERROR]: An error occured while connecting to URL 'https://dl.dropbox.com/u/90411166/Mod%20Versions/Mekanism.txt.'
[09:45:14 ERROR]: An error occured while connecting to URL 'https://dl.dropbox.com/u/90411166/Donators/Mekanism.txt.'
大佬看看啊，是mod问题还是电脑问题。在线等。急

replies.author: 帕帕武
replies.txt_content: 请根据四楼的回答输入/fml confirm来确认删除原本地图中含有已删除mod的方块

replies.author: oqingzhao
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 boqingzhao 于 2019-2-18 15:24 编辑 
黑崎丶一护 发表于 2019-2-18 09:50
在后台输入/fml confirm
可以了，谢谢

replies.author: 黑崎丶一护
replies.txt_content:
boqingzhao 发表于 2019-2-18 15:23
输入不了啊，只要一遇到这种情况，指令输入不了
你得在后台开启服，并且等到进度条不动的时候。接着输入/fml confirm '/'一定要！
